channel.title: Documentation Scratch Addons
channel.description: Contenu récent sur Documentation Scratch Addons

item.title: Commencement Rapide
item.description: Installation Let’s get started by installing Scratch Addons. Store Installer Supported browsers Chrome Web Store Google Chrome and other Chromium-based browsers Add-ons for Firefox Mozilla Firefox Microsoft Edge Addons Microsoft Edge More information can be read on Installing. Commencement Pour commencer, vous avez besoin d’accéder aux paramètres de vos extensions pour voir ses fonctions. Locate Scratch Addons on the toolbar and click it. Usually, it is on the top-right corner of your browser.

item.title: Installation
item.description: Depuis le magasin d’extension Scratch Addons is available in these stores. Store Installer Supported browsers System requirements Chrome Web Store Google Chrome 80+ Microsoft Edge 80+ Opera 67+ Brave 1.3+ Vivaldi 2.11+ Chromium 80+ Windows 7+ OS X / MacOS 10.11+ Chromebooks less than ~6 years old Add-ons for Firefox Mozilla Firefox 86+ Windows 7+ OS X / MacOS 10.12+ Microsoft Edge Addons Microsoft Edge 80+ Windows 7+ OS X / MacOS 10.
